name: TubeMedia
description:
Pick up that instrument   again, and get back in the seat. Music is for Life and all that! 

Could this be called a game?  Not really!    It's more of a life hack tool.....

" Music player for the Players" to split music tracks into STEM parts so you can play or sing along to the track.   

So, this is the first beta version of what I hope will be interesting to "some".  Feedback is very welcome and important. 

TubeMedia Website link
